不幸的是，该系列最近结束了第三季，预计这将是最后一季。该节目做了一项有价值的工作，将所有松散的线索都绑起来了，所以如果这是最后一季，它就会高调播出。

然而，如果你问系列明星布伦丹亨特，可能会有更多“泰德套索”的希望。

当被问及是否会有第四季，或者是否有任何分拆计划向前推进时，亨特说“拍板回答，这也是 100% 正确的”是现在没有人知道。亨特确实补充说，参与该节目的每个人都会休息一下，而且“一切皆有可能”。

但是，这也意味着该节目有可能已经结束，并且将来不会有任何额外的“Ted Lasso”剧集。

就目前而言，该节目的大部分演员都对任何可能的剧集或衍生剧发表了积极的评论。扮演基莉·琼斯的朱诺·坦普尔此前曾告诉Deadline ，一部由女性主导的衍生剧将会“令人惊叹”，看看“她们将如何继续一起做美好的事情，以及这将如何渗透到其他女性身上”对其他女人。”

该衍生剧的另一个潜在主角是汉娜·沃丁汉姆，她在剧中饰演丽贝卡·韦尔顿。 她参观了“凯莉·克拉克森秀”，谈论本季/剧集的结局，并表示如果这真的是最后一季，她会和剧迷一样悲痛欲绝。

“我想用记事本和笔把他困在地牢里，然后就走了，伙计，你在做什么？”你无法摆脱它，”她继续说道。 “这些角色是如此受人喜爱，我们都喜欢它。”

就目前而言，尚无官方消息这是否是“泰德套索”的结尾。 Apple TV+ 并未续订第四季，也未表示该剧已完结。

流光还没有正式宣布任何分拆。

“Ted Lasso”在 Apple TV+ 上大受欢迎，该节目最近在 4 月份创下了尼尔森收视率的最高纪录， 观众观看该节目的总时长达到 7.95 亿分钟。

; Fri, 02 Jun 2023 16:57:15 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/ted-lasso-stars-arent-ruling-out-more-from-afc-richmond-in-the-future https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/ted-lasso-stars-arent-ruling-out-more-from-afc-richmond-in-the-future Evan Selleck Rollo wireless label printer review: Thermal, AirPrint-enabled postage printing

无线 Rollo 打印机是任何经常运送产品的人的必备小工具——无论是只运送给朋友和家人，还是经营小型企业。

打印标签绝对是一件痛苦的事情。您必须处理所有事情，从运输费用过高、以合适的尺寸打印它们，到将标签贴在包裹上。

虽然它不能解决在线运输的所有痛点，但支持 Wi-Fi 的新型 Rollo 热敏打印机肯定会尽力缓解大部分问题。

因为这是热敏打印机，所以不需要墨水或墨盒。它只使用热量和兼容的热敏纸。不过它确实有大约 650,000 个标签的使用寿命，所以它不会永远持续下去。但是，如果您要运送 650,000 个包裹，您可能无论如何都会寻找更工业化的解决方案。

它适用于 4 厘米（1.57 英寸）到 10.4 厘米（4.1 英寸）宽的纸张和标签，理论上无限长，几乎可以打印任何标签。

Rollo 无线打印机 - 紧凑的设计

Rollo 打印机是最紧凑的打印机之一，比传统的全尺寸打印机小得多。当然，这只会打印那些小标签，而不是整张纸。

把Rollo打印机拿在手里

不过，放置起来几乎有点尴尬，因为纸张和电源都不在打印机内。电源是一个现成的适配器，顶部贴有 Rollo 贴纸，有望放在您的办公桌下。

大电源

至少 Rollo 给电源贴上了标签，这样当你把它从一盒电线中拉出来时，你就知道它属于哪里。在打印机的背面，您会找到电源输入、USB B 型端口和物理电源开关。

纸以一叠标签的形式出现，这些标签可以折叠起来。最上面的标签在顶部关闭之前放入打开的打印机中，将其固定到位。

在 Rollo 中插入新纸

将纸张装入内部后，它会在检测到前沿并正确对齐以进行下一个打印作业时进出打印机。

Rollo 无线打印机 - 节省打印

变量很多，但一般来说，Rollo 打印机可以帮助您节省打印成本。许多应用程序和服务都通过美国的大型运输公司协商价格。

与公司本身相比，UPS、FedEx 和 USPS 是通过 Rollo 应用程序购买标签时可以提供更低成本的运输服务之一。

创建运输标签

我们去创建一个按需标签，Rollo 指导我们输入包裹的详细信息，如重量和尺寸。然后我们会看到运送包裹的所有不同选项以及我们可以节省多少。

通过 USPS 购买时，在同一州运送一个小盒子需要 10.75 美元，但通过 Rollo 只需 8.58 美元。 UPS 显然还会向我们收取 71.79 美元的 Next Day Air 服务费用，但在 Rollow 应用程序中仅为 17.18 美元。

您可以通过 ShipStation、eBay、PirateShip 或 EasyShip 获得类似的费率，但这是更好的解决方案，因为它具有出色的用户界面、随附的硬件，并且没有月费。

Rollo 无线打印机 - 一款出色的移动应用程序

拆箱 Rollo 打印机是一种享受。内部印刷和古怪的拆箱体验非常周到，引起了很多关注。

除此之外，硬件也是优质的。打印机外观时尚紧凑，操作方便，占用空间小。

我们没想到的是出色的移动应用程序。

应用设置

该移动应用程序将指导您完成打印机的首次设置过程，其中包括将其加入您的网络。它首先通过蓝牙在本地进行扫描，以将其与您的手机配对。

应用程序设置的其余部分

蓝牙连接后，它将传送您的 Wi-Fi 凭据。一旦它连接到 Wi-Fi，我们立即看到它可以作为我们手机上的网络打印机使用。

虽然我们确实有初始固件更新，但固件更新会在后台自动提供。有一天，我们走到我们的打印机前，看到一条打印出来的确认消息，让我们知道更新已安装。

当您打开应用程序时，Rollo 应用程序有一个有用的仪表板视图。您可以立即创建一个新货件，查看当月的销售额、任何未完成的订单，并且您可以跟踪您的外发包裹。

虽然您可以为任何包裹创建标签，但对商家的关注点清晰易懂。

Rollo 集成

在 Rollo 应用程序中，商家可以直接与电子商务平台集成。它支持 Wix、Square、Shopify、Amazon、Etsy、eBay、PayPal、沃尔玛和 Squarespace 等。

当您的电子商务商店连接时，订单将被分组并显示在 Rollo 应用程序中。我们使用我们的 eBay 帐户对此进行了测试，并在收到新订单时立即看到它。

与易趣集成

然后，Rollo 帮助我们生成标签、打印它们，并在 eBay 上填充跟踪信息——所有这些都在其应用程序中完成。有几次我们不得不重新进行身份验证，但除此之外，这是一种近乎无缝的体验。

Rollo 无线打印机——打印标签

从标准打印机打印时，您需要做一些事情来确保标签打印正确。例如，在打印屏幕上选择正确的纸张尺寸。

有了 Rollo，事情就神奇地发生了。至少大部分时间。

当从选定来源打印时，Rollo 将使用标签自动检测来识别何时是标签而不是标签。当我们尝试从 eBay 网站打印时，这种方法奏效了——在移动设备和Mac上。

尽管打印预览中显示了更多信息，但当它打印到 Rollo 时，只有标签出来了，而且它被完美裁剪和调整大小。

但是，当您下载标签然后尝试打印它们时，这失败了。如果您有来自其他来源的标签，您可能必须在按 CMD+P 之前裁剪标签。

通过 AirPrint 选择打印机

我们在审查的设置部分简要介绍了它，但我们想特别指出在 Apple 设备上设置是多么容易。此打印机支持 Apple AirPrint，这意味着一旦连接到网络，它就会自动出现在所有 Apple 设备上。

只需点击打印并从可用设备列表中选择打印机。无需安装任何软件、驱动程序或其他任何东西，即可立即与我们的 iPhone、 iPad和 Mac 配合使用。

您应该购买 Rollo 无线打印机吗？

我们对 Rollo 无线打印机非常满意。设计一流，设置完美，并且擅长打印各种尺寸的标签。

它的价格略低于 300 美元，如果您每年要送出几次生日礼物，那将不会是一笔快速的购买。如果您在 eBay 上出售旧东西或经营在线商店，这是您可以买到的最好的标签打印机之一。

罗洛打印标签

Rollo 无线打印机 - 优点

  • 紧凑型设计
  • 可爱的包装、信息和用户界面
  • 很棒的应用
  • 便于使用
  • 支持 AirPrint
  • 销售渠道整合
  • 运费折扣

Rollo 无线打印机 - 缺点

  • 有时自动裁剪不起作用
  • 大电源

评分：4 分（满分 5 分）

哪里可以买到 Rollo 无线打印机

; Fri, 02 Jun 2023 14:43:42 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/deals-apple-airtag-4-pack-79-1300-off-m1-max-macbook-pro-sonos-speakers-25-off-more https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/deals-apple-airtag-4-pack-79-1300-off-m1-max-macbook-pro-sonos-speakers-25-off-more Jess Pingrey Apple headset 'leaked' benchmarks are a total fabrication

神秘的基准测试已经浮出水面，据称可以给出该公司耳机中 Apple X1 芯片的性能结果——但结果是伪造的。

耳机操作系统的传闻名称是“xrOS”，芯片的术语“X1”与该特定命名系统一致。但是，这就是合法性结束的地方。

6 月 1 日在 Geekbench上列出的“Reality”（Apple 混合现实耳机的传闻名称）的 Metal 得分为 141,585。其他信息显示该芯片配备 12 个内核，很可能包括 8 个专用于提供高性能和 4 个优化效率的内核。此外，基准测试声称基本频率为 3.68GHz 并支持 64GB 内存。

问题是，结果是伪造的。我们对此有自己的疑问，并就真实性向 Geekbench 求助。虽然我们没有得到回应，但在出现在基准测试网站上后不久，Geekbench 就将该列表标记为不准确。

根据目前的传闻，据推测苹果将在即将于 6 月 5 日举行的WWDC 2023 主题演讲中推出 Reality 耳机。

; Fri, 02 Jun 2023 14:14:43 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/apple-headset-leaked-benchmarks-are-a-total-fabrication https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/apple-headset-leaked-benchmarks-are-a-total-fabrication Andrew Orr Apple unveils opening date for new retail store at London's Battersea Power Station

周五，Apple 公布了其新零售店的开业日期，该零售店将设在该公司英国总部所在的前发电站内。

新零售店的网页包含注册艺术之旅和摄影之旅的链接，以庆祝开业和探索发电站。此外，Apple 制作了以砖块为主题的墙纸，让人联想到车站的建设。

该车站以其华丽的装饰艺术风格室内装潢和装饰而闻名，是世界上最大的砖结构建筑之一。由于其建筑意义和为该地区供电的历史重要性，它于 1980 年被宣布为遗产地。

遗产地是一个因其文化、历史或建筑价值而得到认可的地方，并受到法律保护，可以为子孙后代保存其遗产。遗产地的指定确保了该遗址的特征、重要性和完整性得到保护。

; Fri, 02 Jun 2023 12:38:27 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/wwdc-2023-is-near-m2-macs-are-coming-and-meta-quest-3-on-the-appleinsider-podcast https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/06/02/wwdc-2023-is-near-m2-macs-are-coming-and-meta-quest-3-on-the-appleinsider-podcast William Gallagher Apple petitioned India for slacker labor laws, and unions are fighting back

富士康现已获得卡纳塔克邦当局对其新iPhone工厂的正式批准，此前印度法律对条件进行了修改。富士康和苹果公司都为这一改变进行了游说，该改变认为女性的工作时间更长，而且还可以通宵工作。

以前，妇女不允许上夜班，工厂每天最多工作九小时。在卡纳塔克邦实施并在印度各地施压的新法律变更意味着工厂现在可以运行两个 12 小时轮班制。

这意味着工厂现在可以连续运营，但这也意味着工人每天的轮班时间可能会延长三个小时。不过，有一个上限，法律将工人“任何一周”的工作时间限制在 48 小时以内。

正如RestOfWorld.org所详述的，该法律还规定，这项额外工作“须经此类工作人员的书面同意”。如果他们工作的时间更长，“该工人该周的剩余天数应享有带薪假期。”

然而，工会反对 2023 年工厂（卡纳塔克邦修正案）法案。据RestofWorld.org 报道，全印联合工会中心 (AIUTUC) 在抗议期间烧毁了该法案的副本。

“现在，时钟倒转了，”工会主席 K. Radhakrishnan 告诉该出版物。 “这违反了劳动法书中的每一条规定。”

据报道，工会已向国际劳工组织投诉苹果和富士康。

苹果和富士康的游说是减少制造业对中国依赖的长期举措的一部分。 Apple 目前在印度生产近 7% 的 iPhone，这超出了计划。

最终，人们相信苹果的目标是在印度工厂生产四分之一的 iPhone。蒂姆库克在2023 年 4 月表示，苹果“致力于在全国范围内发展和投资”。

与此同时，印度信息技术部副部长​​ Rajeev Chandrasekhar 表示：“我非常有信心苹果与印度的这种合作伙伴关系在投资、增长、出口和就业方面有很大的发展空间。”

“[包括]在未来几年翻一番和三倍，”他继续道。

尽管是一款较旧的设备，iPad 9 仍然在平板电脑市场占有一席之地，提供了 Apple 用户所期望的可靠和无缝的用户体验。

Fire Max 11 对比 iPad 9 - 设计

与之前的塑料机身亚马逊平板电脑相比，Fire Max 11 的铝制机身给人一种更高级的感觉。同样，iPad 也是使用铝制造的，铝是苹果平板设备的长期材料。

关于尺寸，Fire Max 11 的尺寸为 10.2 英寸 x 6.44 英寸 x 0.30 英寸，而 iPad 9 略小，为 9.8 英寸 x 6.8 英寸，厚度相当，为 0.29 英寸。这两款设备的重量几乎相同，iPad 重 1.07 磅，Fire Max 11 重 1.08 磅。

这两种设备的所有者都会发现在旅行时将它们紧凑地存放起来很方便，因为它们在包或行李箱中占用的空间很小。

Fire Max 11 与 iPad 9 - 显示

Amazon Fire Max 11 的 11 英寸屏幕比第 9 代 iPad 上的 10.2 英寸 Retina 显示屏更大。 Fire Max 11 的分辨率为 2,000 x 1,200，像素密度为每英寸 213 像素，而 iPad 的分辨率更高，为 2,160 x 1,620 像素，密度更高，为 264ppi。

iPad 的显示屏也更亮，亮度可达 500 尼特，而 Fire Max 11 的亮度可达 410 尼特。更亮的显示屏意味着用户在户外使用平板电脑时可以更好地看到屏幕上的内容。

亚马逊 Fire Max 11 的布局

这两种设备都有一个共同特征，即有助于减少蓝光波长的影响。科学研究表明，长时间暴露在蓝光下会导致眼睛疲劳或其他与视力相关的问题。

Having a display certified for low blue light emission can benefit our eyes and sleep, mainly when using the device for extended periods. The Fire Max 11 holds a certification for low blue light, although Apple does not specify any specific certifications for the iPad.

Nonetheless, Apple offers Night Shift, which serves the same purpose. Night Shift utilizes the clock and geolocation functionalities of the iPad to determine the sunset time in your location.

As a result, it automatically adjusts the display colors to warmer tones during the evening and reverts to the regular settings in the morning.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Processor

The iPad 9 is powered by the A13 Bionic chip with two high-performance and four high-efficiency cores. Meanwhile, the Fire Max 11 boasts an octa-core processor from MediaTek (MT8188J) with two Arm Cortex A78 and six Cortex A55 CPUs.

Geekbench lists benchmarks for the A13 Bionic in the iPad 9 at 1,684 in single-core performance and 3,684 for multi-core. On the other hand, the Fire Max 11 may have comparatively slower performance.

While the Geekbench listing does not mention the Fire Max 11 specifically, it does present a benchmark for the ARM MT8188JV/A chip, exhibiting a single-core performance score of 689 and a multi-core score of 1,975.

Despite being an older device, the iPad 9 significantly surpasses the Fire Max 11 in this particular aspect.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Camera

The Fire Max 11 and the iPad both use an eight-megapixel rear camera sensor. The Fire Max 11 also has an eight-megapixel front camera sensor, but the iPad surpasses this with a 12-megapixel Ultra Wide front camera.

Both devices can record 1080p video. Furthermore, the iPad offers additional features such as 3x video zoom, support for slo-mo video recording at 720p and 120 frames-per-second, and 720p HD video recording at 30 fps.

The Fire Max 11 from Amazon also features a front camera on the side when used in landscape mode. This placement is advantageous for video calls, primarily when the tablet is utilized in landscape orientation alongside a keyboard.

The iPad's rear camera

However, the iPad 9 maintains the front camera's placement at the top when used in portrait mode, remaining consistent with previous models. This aspect could be a deciding factor or a deal-breaker for people seeking a tablet primarily for work purposes.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Connectivity

Both tablets offer robust connectivity options, with the iPad 10.2 offering cellular connectivity in addition to Wi-Fi 5, while the Fire Max 11 offers the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology for faster and more reliable connections.

The Fire Max 11 also incorporates Bluetooth 5.3 technology, which enables seamless connectivity with A2DP-compatible stereo headphones, speakers, microphones, and LE accessories. In contrast, the iPad 9 has Bluetooth 4.2.

Bluetooth 5.3 offers enhanced speed, lower power consumption, and improved audio quality compared to Bluetooth 4.2. Nevertheless, Bluetooth 4.2 remains highly functional with devices still in active use.

Similarly, Wi-Fi 6 is better at handling a large volume of connected devices than Wi-Fi 5, providing better speeds, lower latency, and more efficient power usage. But upgrading to a router that can handle Wi-Fi 6 may be more expensive than using networking hardware that operates using Wi-Fi 5 and lower.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Battery

Although the iPad 9 offers approximately 10 hours of battery life for web browsing and video playback on Wi-Fi, Amazon claims that the Fire Max 11 surpasses it by providing up to 14 hours of power for activities such as reading, web browsing, video watching, and music listening.

Furthermore, the Fire Max 11 can be fully charged in under 4.2 hours using the USB-C cable and 9W power adapter provided in the bundle. However, the iPad 9 surpasses this by reaching a full charge in approximately two hours and 45 minutes.

There is the potential on each device to achieve even faster charging speeds when used with chargers that have higher wattage.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Other features

Both the Fire Max 11 and the iPad 9 incorporate a fingerprint sensor into their designs. The fingerprint sensor on the Amazon tablet is integrated into the power button, similar to specific newer iPad models.

On the other hand, the iPad 9 features the Touch ID/Home button positioned at the bottom front of the display.

Other features each tablet shares are support for keyboards and a stylus. The Fire Max 11 is compatible with a full-size magnetic keyboard and supports a stylus similar to the iPad 9.

The Fire Max 11 has a camera bump, and the cases accommodate it

However, it's worth noting that these accessories are not included in the package for either device and require a separate purchase.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - Color, Capacity, Price

The Fire Max 11 is exclusively offered in Gray, whereas the iPad 9 provides color options of Silver and Space Gray. Regarding storage configurations, the Fire Max 11 is available in 64GB and 128GB options, while the iPad offers 64GB and 256 GB.

In contrast to the iPad, the Fire Max 11 is equipped with a microSD slot that enables users to expand the storage capacity by up to 1TB. However, throughout its tablet lineup, Apple has consistently omitted the inclusion of a microSD slot, necessitating users to evaluate their storage requirements and consider utilizing iCloud as an alternative.

The base configuration of the iPad 9th Generation costs $329 and provides 64GB of storage and Wi-Fi connectivity. Choosing Wi-Fi + Cellular increases that to $459.

The 256GB configuration costs $479 for the Wi-Fi version and $609 to add cellular connectivity. The price is the same for each configuration to add accessories, including an Apple Pencil for $99 ( on sale at Amazon ) and a Smart Keyboard for $159 ( check price ).

The Amazon Fire Max 11 is more affordable at $229 with 64GB of storage , but that version forces advertisements onto the lock screen. Choosing the option to omit ads brings the price to $244.99.

Yet, there is a potential shift in this scenario with the introduction of the 128GB variant, which solely offers the choice of "Without Lockscreen Ads" for $279.99. Additionally, each model has various bundles available, including a keyboard, stylus, or both.

Fire Max 11 versus iPad 9 - What to Buy

When it comes to screen size, the Fire Max 11 offers an 11-inch display, which is larger than the iPad's 10.2-inch screen. This extra screen real estate can make a significant difference for users who frequently watch videos, read, or browse the web on their tablet.

While the iPad's display is certainly clear and vibrant, the larger display of the Fire Max 11 provides a more immersive viewing experience.

Storage flexibility is another area where the Fire Max 11 has an edge over the iPad. Unlike the iPad, which requires users to commit to a fixed amount of storage at the time of purchase, the Fire Max 11 features a microSD slot.

This allows users to expand storage up to 1TB, providing a level of flexibility that the iPad can't match without cloud storage.

In terms of connectivity, the Fire Max 11 supports the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology and Bluetooth 5.3, which can provide faster and more reliable connections than the iPad's Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 4.2.

While the iPad's connectivity options are good enough for most users, the Fire Max 11's more advanced technology could be a deciding factor for users who require the fastest and most reliable connections possible.

Battery life is another key consideration when choosing a tablet. The iPad offers a respectable 10 hours of battery life, but the Fire Max 11 outperforms it by offering up to 14 hours of power.

The extended battery life could be a significant advantage for users who use their tablet extensively throughout the day or during long trips without access to a charger.

Finally, price is a crucial factor for many buyers. The Fire Max 11 is more affordable than the iPad, even when opting for the version without lockscreen ads.

Though the iPad offers a robust and reliable tablet experience, the Fire Max 11's lower price point makes it an attractive choice for those seeking a tablet with premium features but at a more budget-friendly price.

The iPad is a strong contender in the tablet market, but the Fire Max 11 offers several compelling advantages that could make it a more appealing choice for some users.

If you love the feel of a mechanical keyboard, but you don't want to compromise on aesthetics, the Lofree Flow mechanical keyboard makes an impressive showing with a stunning, simple design coupled with some of the best mechanical switches we've seen so far.

Mechanical keyboards are popular for plenty of reasons. However, many mechanical keyboards have bulky designs, making them less ideal for those on the go.

That's why we were excited to check out Lofree's Flow. This low-profile, portable mechanical keyboard has much to offer individuals who value convenience and performance.

Lofree Flow - Design

When we unboxed the Flow, we were pleased with its design. It is available in white and black and visually pairs well with Apple devices, making it an appealing choice for those seeking a cohesive aesthetic.

The all-aluminum body not only looks great but it adds durability to its lightweight construction, ensuring that it can withstand the rigors of travel.

The Flow's ultra-portable design, with a 10mm profile, makes it convenient for on-the-go usage. It's easy to toss it in a bag along with your iPad .

This is also the first keyboard to offer low-profile Kailh Full POM switches, available in both linear "ghost" and tactile "phantom" variants. Lofree says the switches are self-lubricating and will improve over time.

The switches are also hot-swappable, offering flexibility for customization without the need for soldering. This is one of our favorite features, giving users a chance to swap out switches in the future if they want to.

The Lofree Flow features a gasket mount, which ensures comfortable and quiet typing by providing additional cushioning.

The smooth, matte PBT keycaps are fantastic to type on.

For those looking for a touch of customization, the Lofree Flow features an understated RGB sidelight that adds a hint of flair without being overly flashy. We often find that RGB keyboards can feel a bit immature, so this subtle addition is welcome.

The subtle side lights offer customization without feeling overly flashy

Connectivity options are versatile, with USB-C and Bluetooth 5.0 available. It makes it a good keyboard for your Mac , but also for your iPad or iPhone , should you want that option.

Lofree Flow - Performance

We loved the Lofree Flow.

Typing on the Flow is fantastic. We received the linear ghost switches, which are smooth but still feel sufficiently responsive. It's easy to type quickly and accurately on the Flow. When switching from the Lofree 1% , we found that there wasn't as much of an adjustment time as we would have anticipated.

Thanks to the gasket mount, the Flow is also much quieter than other keyboards we've tried. However, it doesn't dampen the feel of the keys, which are still satisfying to type on.

In fact, if you like the sound and feel of a mechanical keyboard but don't want to bother other people with excessive noise, the Lofree Flow is probably one of the best keyboards we've tried out.

While we think the typing experience is fantastic, there are a few areas where the keyboard could be improved.

Our first gripe is that while the 3.9-degree angled typing surface adds ergonomic comfort, some users may prefer a slightly higher angle for an optimal typing experience. We wished it would have been angled a little more, but when compared to something like an Apple Magic Keyboard , it honestly feels much better.

The keycaps are pleasant to touch, but we have concerns they may stain

As far as longevity goes, we are concerned that the keycaps could become stained with use — which is a fear we have with any light-colored, matte keycaps. Because of this, we suggest avoiding eating while using your keyboard and keeping it away from anything that could stain it.

The most significant issue we found is that the keyboard doesn't seem to automatically go into a power-saving mode. So, sure. Lofree advertises a 40-hour battery life, but — at least for us — that includes the time you don't use it. To avoid this, you'll need to remember to manually switch off your keyboard, which isn't something we're used to doing.

Who the Lowfree Flow is for

Overall, the Lofree Flow mechanical keyboard is a solid offering. Its low-profile switches and gasket mount provide a comfortable, enjoyable, and quiet typing experience.

It blends style and functionality to make it an all-around good keyboard for daily use, especially for those who need to type for extended periods of time.

Lofree Flow mechanical - Pros

  • Smooth switches that are easy to adapt to
  • Design fits well into the Apple aesthetic
  • Lightweight, portable
  • Subtle lighting effects
  • Surprisingly quiet for a mechanical keyboard

Lofree Flow mechanical - Cons

  • No auto-sleep mode
  • Keycaps could be prone to staining
  • Shallow angle may not be enough for some users

Rating: 4 out of 5
